name: Loner Corner
description:
This game is for two players.
Player one hides toilet paper and places hazards (Player one shouldn't see this process)
The second player tries to find the paper.  In case he finds it - he won.

WASD - move.
MOUSE - look around.
SPACE - pick up objects in front of you if you play as the player one.

Ring around an object shows the occupied radius of the object(you cannot place any other objects within it). Have fun))
